Sizzlipede (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0849: Toxtricity
Pokémon
#0851: Centiskorch →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Sizzlipede (TCG Pocket).

Sizzlipede has been featured on 8 different cards since it debuted in the Sword & Shield expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Sizzlipede cards are normally Fire-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Sizzlipede

Sizzlipede
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Sizzlipede Sword & Shield 037/202 Sword 010/060
Champion's Path 009/073 Fire Incineroar V Deck   017/127
        Shiny Star V   025/190
Shining Fates SV018/SV122 Shiny Star V 217/190
Sizzlipede Sword & Shield 038/202 V Starter Set Fire   009/023
Sizzlipede Battle Styles 029/163 Rapid Strike Master 015/070
        Start Deck 100   074/414
Sizzlipede Fusion Strike 046/264 Sword & Shield Family Pokémon Card Game   011/053
Sizzlipede Fusion Strike 047/264 Blue Sky Stream 016/067
Sizzlipede Temporal Forces 036/162 Wild Force 010/071
Sizzlipede Surging Sparks 027/191 Super Electric Breaker 015/106
Sizzlipede         Mega Symphonia 012/063


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
